name: apsis (itch) (syrtis)
description:
COM: Good morning, Porter. Today is Monday, January 1st, 0000. We have arrived in orbit above New Eden. How was your sleep?

interstellar colony ship Future's Dawn has arrived at its destination - the exoplanet new eden.

you are Porter, an AI designed to assist in unloading and running the new colony.

made for NaNoRen0 2022, apsis can be played in around 10-15 minutes.

NEW EDEN COLONY CORPORATION IS A SUBSIDIARY OF MILANKOVITCH. BUILDING THE FUTURE, TODAY.
